edited_stories.edited_story_text: the family went on a trip to the beach, here is what the beach looks like in the winter . the sun was setting and the sky was clear, you could see for miles . the day was beautiful so we decided to walk down the snow covered path . the trees were very pretty with the reflection of the sun shining on the branches . the sunset was a sight to behold, there is just something about sunsets that make me feel calm .
